subject: Investing
title: International Dividend Stocks
description: Learn International Dividend Stocks in one minute.

hook.text: European and Australian companies often yield twice as much as their US counterparts. Geography matters.

buildup.text: International dividend stocks add geographic diversification and exposure to different economic cycles.

discovery.text: Countries like the UK, Australia, and Canada have strong dividend cultures with high payout traditions.

punchline.text: Higher yield abroad comes with a tax receipt attached. Factor it in before you invest.

quiz.question: What is a common downside of international dividend stocks?
options: Foreign withholding taxes reduce take-home yield
